author: matz-e
body:
Changes to the HCAL HF fine-grain, after problems with #14471 became apparent in DQM (see #15389):
- separate HF threshold from HBHE
- includes back-port of #15514 (expanding the compression methods to allow several FG bits)
- properly sets FG bit 1 for HF TP (@nsmith-, I misread your comment [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14471#issuecomment-218728012))
- access with `tp.t0().fineGrain(1)`

Creating this PR now for DQM to test.
title: Adjustments to HCAL HF TP 2016 fine-grain
